title: Officer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you can choose to put on a Bulletproof Vest, granting you basic defense until broken. You can only do this once.
- At night, you can choose to Investigate, learning a player's role. You can only do this once.
- At night, you can choose to Detain during the day, roleblocking a player tonight and being able to talk to them in chat anonymously. You can only do this once. This does not defend players the way a Jail does.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB immune yada yada for nights when you arrest players
- You gain Powerful Defense against your Detained player

desc:
Post 4455
*Many mafia movies depict the corrupt and immoral police department to create a little sympathy for the mob. I thought that idea was kinda cool for a GIM faction.*
